languages.text: Вольный Торговец спешит к лифтам и спускается на нижние палубы — кадр покачивается от быстрого полета сервочерепа. Неожиданно запись резко искажается — по экрану ползут помехи, а пикт мотает из стороны в сторону. Устройство врезается в торчащую балку, и картинка разбивается на десятки мелких частей:

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец спешит к лифтам и спускается на нижние палубы. Запись резко искажается — по экрану ползут помехи, а сервочереп мотает из стороны в сторону. Устройство врезается в торчащую балку, и картинка разбивается на десятки мелких частей:

languages.text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец спешит к лифтам и спускается на нижние палубы — кадр покачивается от быстрого полета сервочерепа. Неожиданно запись резко искажается — по экрану ползут помехи, а пикт мотает из стороны в сторону. Устройство врезается в торчащую балку, и картинка разбивается на десятки мелких частей:

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks — the frame is shaking from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict is rocking back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture is shattered into dozens of small pieces:

The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks — the frame is shaking from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict is rocking back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture is shattered into dozens of small pieces:

The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente corre al ascensor y baja a la cubierta inferior. La velocidad de vuelo del servocráneo hace que la imagen se agite. De pronto, la grabación se distorsiona. Aparece estática en la pantalla y la grabación se tambalea. El dispositivo choca con una viga y la imagen se hace pedazos.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente corre al ascensor y baja a la cubierta inferior. La velocidad de vuelo del servocráneo hace que la imagen se agite. De pronto, la grabación se distorsiona. Aparece estática en la pantalla y la grabación se tambalea. El dispositivo choca con una viga y la imagen se hace pedazos.

languages.text: 行商浪人冲向电梯，来到了下层甲板，伺服头骨的屏幕也由于快速飞行而不断颤动。突然之间，视讯记录变得严重失真，屏幕上出现了噪点，图像来回晃动。设备撞上了一根突出的横梁，画面上的图像碎裂成了几十块细小的碎片。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人冲向电梯，来到了下层甲板，伺服头骨的屏幕也由于快速飞行而不断颤动。突然之间，视讯记录变得严重失真，屏幕上出现了噪点，图像来回晃动。设备撞上了一根突出的横梁，画面上的图像碎裂成了几十块细小的碎片。

languages.text: 自由開拓者がエレベーターへと急いで下層デッキに降ると、サーヴォスカルがビュンと飛び、映像フレームが揺れた。突然録音が大きく歪んで、画面にノイズが表示され、映像が前後に揺れる。装置が突き出た梁に衝突すると、映像はバラバラに砕けてしまった。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者がエレベーターへと急いで下層デッキに降ると、サーヴォスカルがビュンと飛び、映像フレームが揺れた。突然録音が大きく歪んで、画面にノイズが表示され、映像が前後に揺れる。装置が突き出た梁に衝突すると、映像はバラバラに砕けてしまった。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} eilt zu den Aufzügen und fährt zu den unteren Decks hinunter, wobei der Bildrahmen durch den rasanten Flug des Servoschädels ins Wanken gerät. Plötzlich wird die Aufnahme stark verzerrt – auf dem Bildschirm erscheint Rauschen, und das Bild wackelt. Das Gerät trifft auf einen hervorstehenden Balken, und das Bild zersplittert in Dutzende von kleinen Stücken:
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} se précipite vers les ascenseurs et descend jusqu'aux ponts inférieurs, {mf|suivi|suivie} par le servocrâne dont le vol rapide secoue l'enregistreur. Soudain, l'image se brouille. Des parasites apparaissent à l'écran, et l'appareil oscille d'avant en arrière, jusqu'à ce qu'il percute une poutre saillante et se brise en mille morceaux.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} se précipite vers les ascenseurs et descend jusqu'aux ponts inférieurs, {mf|suivi|suivie} par le servocrâne dont le vol rapide secoue l'enregistreur. Soudain, l'image se brouille. Des parasites apparaissent à l'écran, et l'appareil oscille d'avant en arrière, jusqu'à ce qu'il percute une poutre saillante et se brise en mille morceaux.

languages.text: Hür Tacir asansörlere koşup alt güvertelere iniyor. Foto çerçevesi, hizmeletin hızlı uçuşuyla titriyor. Kayıt bir anda büyük ölçüde bozuluyor. Ekran parazitleniyor, foto ileri geri sallanıyor. Cihaz, çıkıntı yapmış bir sütuna çarpıyor. Foto da onlarca küçük parçaya ayrılıyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rushes to the elevators and goes down to the lower decks, the pict frame juddering from the servo-skull's swift flight. Suddenly, the recording is heavily distorted — noise appears on the screen, and the pict rocks back and forth. The device hits a protruding beam, and the picture shatters into dozens of small pieces:

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir asansörlere koşup alt güvertelere iniyor. Foto çerçevesi, hizmeletin hızlı uçuşuyla titriyor. Aniden kayıt, büyük ölçüde bozuluyor. Ekran parazitleniyor, foto ileri geri sallanıyor. Cihaz, çıkıntı yapmış bir sütuna çarpıyor ve foto düzinelerce küçük parçaya ayrılıyor.
